forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West wind around 8 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 48. West southwest wind 2 to 8 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco this afternoon, the sun casts a warm and inviting glow, draping the landscape in cheerful light. The air, tinged with the gentle whispers of a west wind, carries a hint of the crispness typical of coastal cities. For those venturing out, the backdrop is refreshingly clear, devoid of fog, revealing the city's iconic outlines against a brilliant blue sky. As the day unfolds, temperatures will gradually dip, inviting a light sweater or a stylish jacket for evening strolls.

As night approaches, the clouds will softly roll in, bringing with them a quiet charm—a perfect backdrop for an evening gathering at a local café or a serene walk along the waterfront. The mild temperatures will hover around comfort, encouraging one to savor the calmness of the city after sunset. With plenty of options for casual yet fulfilling activities, from a leisurely visit to a nearby park to exploring a cozy bookstore, the evening promises to be a delightful one in the heart of San Francisco.
